message.abyssalascentdimensionpatcher.we: %s Welcome to Abyssal Ascent if you have any questions regarding the modpack or issues you face you can find the discord link by typing /%s or %s
message.abyssalascentdimensionpatcher.di:
%s %s
PLEASE NOTE: Please ensure before creating a ticket or asking questions regarding bugs in #general please visit the #known-bugs channel and see if your issue is listed there
message.abyssalascentdimensionpatcher.bo: %s You have currently set the AA guidebook to be enabled on spawn, if you would like to disable this feature type '/%s' in chat or %s
%s You have currently set the AA guidebook to be disabled on spawn, if you would like to re-enable this feature type '/%s' in chat or %s
message.abyssalascentdimensionpatcher.se: %s You have now set the guide to spawn on death. %s to change
%s You have now set the guide to not spawn on death. %s to change
